courses.label: Aviation Cyber Security
courses.description: This course will help your organization determine where to start in what can seem like a never-ending effort to protect your information ans systems. your next content
objectives: Locate and priortize cyber risks in aviation businesses
Deploy assesment tools specific cyber related risk
Analyze your company's cyber risk profile
Implement Cyber Security Management System (CSMS) guiding principles in your business
eligibility: The recommended level of language proficency is ICAO Operational Level 4 for courses in English or the equivalent level for other languages.
